mapper.select: select A.num, A.order_num, A.menu, A.temperature, A.beverage_size, A.shot, A.syrub, A.whipping, A.price, A.order_date from order_list A, payment B where A.order_num = B.order_num and B.provision = 'N' and B.refund = 'N'
mapper.update: update payment set provision = 'Y' where order_num = #{orderNum}
update payment set refund = 'Y' where order_num = #{orderNum}
mapper.insert: insert into refund values( refund_seq.nextval, #{orderNum}, #{point}, #{card}, #{cash}, #{total}, systimestamp )
